cars.description: This B-Wing bomber packs a powerful punch with it's 4 forward laser cannons and ion cannon. It's a match for any capital ship.
This Corvette-class cruiser is fitted with dual turbolaser turrets and has docking rings for up to three RZ-1 A-Wing starfighters. It's perfect for those on the go who need a little extra protection.
This exquisite YT model light freighter from Corellian Engineering is equiped with a Class 0.5 hyperdrive, 75 metric tons of cargo space and hidden compartments for all you smuggling needs!
This A-Wing interceptor is great for planetary patrols. Reaching upwards of 1,300 kph in atmosphere, you can get where you need to go in a hurry!
This X-Wing starfighter is prefect for any long range strike. Capable of going toe-to-toe with any of the latest TIE series, you can be sure you'll get there and back in one piece!
